name: Peurto Macaruba (Dennis Boersma)
description:
Puerto Macaruba

3rd Person Adventure

You are an elusive pirate with special powers who has been hired to do an impossible job. Your mission is to steal the golden family shield of the Spanish occupiers of the Island of Puerto Macaruba. You arrive by boat in the middle of the night, traveling through the market and get past the guards patrolling the city. Can you grab the shield and make it back to your boat?

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

SAE Amsterdam Student project 2015

3 months time 

  • 10 game students
  • 6 audio students 
  • 1 programmer
